item.description:
What's better than "I had a great time and made new friends." - Ariel S

How about adding: Doing good to that? :)

 

Don't miss our special fundraiser where Boston volunteers has partnered with Paint Nite on March 7 at Orleans bar in Davis Square at 7pm. It will be a fun night of painting and drinking. No experience necessary. A local artist will walk you step-by-step through a painting while you sip cocktails from the bar. All painting supplies will be provided by Paint Nite. Please note: alcohol is not part of the ticket price. You will buy spirits from the bar as you normally would. Tickets are $45 per person.

 

Sign up today because there are only 20 spots. It's great for you to bring your friends or for a special date night.

Don't miss this!

 

Afterwards we'll sip some refreshing spirits, chat, enjoy each others art, make interesting new friends and connect.

 

Because you are a Boston Volunteer, we are allowing 15% off for those that sign up prior to February 28. At checkout on the Paint Nite website use the coupon code BosVol15 for 15% off your ticket price.

Learn more: http://paintnite.com/boston/event/815

 

Part of this money will provide future volunteer opportunities including our popular pet charity event.

I'll provide the results for you during the event. :)

 

This is an Boston Volunteers exclusive event. The number of seats are very limited.

 

There are only 20 tickets for this popular event.

Don't miss this community building adventure! :)
Josh

 

P.S. Learn more: http://paintnite.com/boston/event/815
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the popular group standing next to the door. I'll provide my cell for your convenience. :)

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Paint and Cocktail night
